data.message: Facebook I need help please with my main account. I've been trying for three days leaving you messages and no response. This is very unprofessional.

replies.message: We apologize for the delay, Bella. Please tell us a little more about the problem you're experiencing and we'll do our best to answer any questions. Thanks. -Jessica

Thank you for your reply. On Friday I had to replace my phone and and it saved all the apps and everything but I lost my information on my password to my main Facebook account and the phone numbers that are on my account and the emails on that account are no longer active. I've tried several times to log in and I need help please. My account t is very very special to me. I tried the texting sms that it offers but it prompts me to put in,my password to change anything. Please help me. Thank you.

Hi Bella. Thanks for providing us with more information. You may be able to get back into your Facebook account by answering a security question, using an alternate email address listed on your account or getting help from friends. Keep in mind that you'll only see these options if you set them up. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2qHQXIz. -Brittany

The two emails that were previously on my account were hacked by China last year. I was one of the victims in the Yahoo hacking incidents. I tried to add another email account but it wanted my password.
